Package com.here.sdk.mapview

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    MapCameraObserver
    Interface for objects that want to get updates whenever the map is redrawn after camera parameters change.
    MapRepresentable Deprecated
    Will be removed in v4.9.0.
    MapScene.LoadSceneCallback
    Called on the main thread after MapScene.loadScene(String, WatermarkStyle, MapScene.LoadSceneCallback) has been completed.
    MapView.OnReadyListener
    Listener that gets notified when MapView is fully initialized and ready to handle all operations, which means that map scene is loaded and drawing surface is ready to render a map.
    MapView.TakeScreenshotCallback
    Callback to be called on retrieval of screenshot.
    MapView.ViewPin
    A ViewPin is used to display Android views at a fixed location on the map.
    MapViewBase
    Represents the available public API from MapView.
    MapViewBase.PickMapItemsCallback
    Callback after pick map items operation has completed.
    MapViewLifecycleListener
    Provides a mechanism for observing a lifecycle of a map view and/or implementing components whose lifecycle needs to be linked with that of a map view.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DashPattern
    Represents a dash pattern for MapPolyline.
    LocationIndicator
    Graphical object to represent the location of the user on a MapView.
    MapArrow
    A visual representation of an arrow on the map.
    MapCamera
    Represents the camera looking onto the map.
    MapCamera.FlyToOptions
    Encapsulates options for flyTo animations.
    MapCamera.Orientation
    Represents information on current camera orientation in geodetic coordinate space.
    MapCamera.OrientationUpdate
    Specifies camera parameters that can be used to update the camera's orientation in geodetic coordinate space.
    MapCamera.State
    Encapsulates state of the camera.
    MapCameraLimits
    Controls constraints on camera parameters.
    MapImage
    Represents a drawable resource that can be used by a MapMarker to be shown on the map.
    MapImageFactory
    Convenience factory class for loading marker resources from various sources.
    MapMarker
    MapMarker is used to draw images on the map, for example to mark a specific location.
    MapMarker3D
    MapMarker3D represents a 3D shape rendered on the map at specified geodetic coordinates.
    MapMarker3DModel
    Represents a 3D model that can be used by a MapMarker3D to be shown on the map.
    MapPolygon
    A visual representation of a polygon on the map.
    MapPolyline
    A visual representation of a line on the map.
    MapScene
    Represents a map scene and exposes the functionality to manipulate its content.
    MapScene.Layers
    A collection of map layer identifiers used in the MapScene.setLayerState(java.lang.String, com.here.sdk.mapview.MapScene.LayerState) method.
    MapView
    A view that can display a map.
    PickMapItemsResult
    Carries results from the picking of map items on the map scene.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ImageFormat  
    LineCap
    Determines the cap (line ending) style.
    LocationIndicator.IndicatorStyle
    The predefined styles for the location indicator which are pedestrian and navigation mode.
    LocationIndicator.MarkerType
    Enum to identify different types of markers of the location indicator.
    MapCameraLimits.ErrorCode  
    MapError
    Represents various errors that could occur from MapView operations.
    MapScene.LayerState
    Represents the state and thus the visibility of a map layer.
    MapScheme
    Represents the preconfigured map schemes bundled with the SDK.
    WatermarkPlacement
    Defines the allowed display locations for HERE logo watermark in the preferred order.
    WatermarkStyle
    Defines the style of the HERE watermark logo.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    MapCameraLimits.MapCameraLimitsException
